p: Whole blood was collected in heparin-coated tubes, and plasma was isolated by centrifugation. The KSHV infection status was determined by using quantitative ELISA for identifying circulating IgG antibodies to KSHV proteins (LANA and K8.1) [ 55, 56]. To collect the whole saliva, patients rinse with mouthwash, and saliva was collected in a wide-mouth 50 mL Nalgene tube. Typical volumes range between 3 to 5 mL of mouthwash. The patients were requested to not eat or smoke prior to providing the samples.
